column5: Hey could anyone help me locate some good outfitters and guides for the Georgian Bay. We want to go after some Salmon or Musky this coming fall.
TRY www.sawmill-lodge.com I have caught salmon and musky there this past summer.I even caught one off their docksThey have a nice salmon guide boat and a very good guide.Good Luck
If you are going near the Midland-Honey Harbor area you can try Brian Berriault from Back Water tackle. www.backwatertackle.comBob/Chartertalk
